Do you have steps to reproduce this problem? It looks like your debug target 
terminated while performing a source lookup. In this case, the exceptions are 
logged, but are handled & processing continues.

Deferred. We should handle VM disconnect when performing source lookup without 
logging errors. Not critical.
Fixed in JavaSourceLookupParticipant. Please verify, DW.
